/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Traffic lights and street signs punctuate the scene, guiding the flow of vehicles and pedestrians. The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a warm glow. The image is slightly blurry, adding a sense of motion and dynamism to the scene.
